fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services
industry_forums: Not so far participated but we would wish to do so going forward.
eu_initiatives: All initiatives related to payments - functionality, security are key
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: As an independent, non-profit trade association, engaged in non-competitive promotion of our industry, our mission is: to promote ATM convenience, growth and usage worldwide; to protect the ATM industry's assets, interests, good name and public trust; and to provide education, best practices, political voice and networking opportunities for member organizations.
